title: Evil Remains - Vintage VHS Edition [FANEDIT]
description:
This is the 2005 film "Evil Remains" presented as if it were released on Home Video back in 1987. The film has ben color-treated, and slight dirt has been added. The image is over-cropped from 1.85:1 to 1.33:1 Full screen.

The download includes the entire edit on .VOB format and includes new VHS artwork and a poster.

This is the 2nd release in the "Vintage VHS Editions" Series, and I would like to know what you think so for! Please comment! Go to w w w . f r e e w e b s . c o m / r e t r o h o r r o r r e m i x / for more info.


From your friends at RETRO HORROR REMIX!
